channel.title: Cheek
channel.description:
Heres something i wrote that is basically about what annoys me, i find it a good stress reliver to tell others about what pisses me off, so here it is... Please don't post if you don't read it... and please dont read it if you cba because its just something i wrote for the hell of it. No flaming either.
[u]Hi there, my names dave. I'd like to tell you what annoys me.[/u] [b]Lets get started.[/b] - I know life is unfair, i aknowledge that and dont really care. - Drugs are fine, i've never done them, and if you do them good for you! - I am not religious, and im completely fine with other religions... if its what other people believe then good for them. [b]A little about something tragic that happend to me a few months ago:[/b] "I was tested for drugs at school, its turned out positive for: [canabis & benzodiazipan]" "This was a very traumatic experience for me" "I proved my innocents by getting a professional hair test costing £100" "I showed the evidence to the acusants and they didn't even bother to look or aknowledge it" "I have never been forgiven, not to his day 5+ months later." [b]So that happened... and sure i got angry, but its life, its unfair and im completely and utterly fine with that.[/b] [i]Let me go into more detail about how i view religions: Well every religion is fine, I dont believe in any of it, but the people who do are happy doing it, i always think of that saying : "Ignorance is bliss" when i think of religion... because the people who believe in religion are happy doing it, and it makes them stronger. I am neither calling any religion ignorant or saying they are fake... it's my own belief, i respect others beliefs and they respect mine. [/i] [u][B] So now onto my story [/u][/b] Its thursday mornings school, its assembly morning, its the religious studies teachers turn to take the assemblyl. Great i think to myself, thats cool just sit there and listen and learn. "Goodmorning everybody, we have a special speaker in today to talk about his experience with finding god." Said the Religios Studies teacher. My eyes took sight of a scrawny 30 year old looking guy, whom i immidiatly thought of as "Drug addict". The guy began telling us all a story about how when he was younger he was peer-pressured into doing drugs, this immidiatly shows me that he is a weak person. Sure people like this piss me off, i mean they get to have fun doing drugs and never get caught - and that annoys me because i was punished for what he did.(A bit like jesus i supposed, dying for others sins). So i sit there as usual half listening to a drug addict, his stories went on to say how he went on to do more heavy drugs and how his life went down hill alot. Good for him i suppose. Then comes the dreadful moment... he mentions turning to religion - great i knew it! i knew religion had to be in there somewhere, oh and this is the happy ending, he found a religion and it helped him stop doing the drugs. Yes i was right thats what happened! Ok happy ending for him.... But now whats he saying? that i need to find god... to be forgiven of my sins and he doesnt care about what ive done in the past. And if i do not find god i am going to hell? Oh thats just fucking dandy, lets just list whats happened: - A drug addict has openly addmitted infront of me, and lots of other whitnesses that he was/is a drug addicted [b] and[/b] has supplied others with drugs (making him also a dealer). This annoys me because even though he has admitted it, he will never be punished for it - yet i never have done drugs and i do get punished for it. - A drug addict is telling me to worship a god. Thats fucking gay, i don't go up to his face and tell him god isnt real, and neather should he tell me what/who to worship. In his so called holy book it says do onto others as you wish to be dealt (or something along the lines of that) So this basically says that Christians in particular wish to be harassed and told there faith is wrong. So thats what pisses me off.
